#summary API Project
#labels API

= Project =

== Create ==

 Access HTTP OAuth Project admin 

 Create a Group in the Project with
{{{
  GET /projects/data.json?name=Example&Count=10
}}}
 or
{{{
  POST /projects
  --
  name=Example&Count=10
}}}
 for response JSON (Mime-Type application/json)
{{{
 [
   {
     "identifier": "0aefed",
     "name": "Example",
     "count": "10",
     "members": [
       "aef001",
       "aef002",
       "aef003",
       "aef004",
       "aef005",
       "aef006",
       "aef007",
       "aef008",
       "aef009",
       "aef00a"
     ]
   }
 ]
}}}

== List members ==

 Access HTTP OAuth Project admin 

 Read a Group in the Project with
{{{
  GET /projects/0fac9/data.json
}}}
 for response JSON (Mime-Type application/json)
{{{
 [
   {
     "identifier": "0fac9",
     "name": "Example",
     "count": "10",
     "members": [
       "ofc001",
       "ofc002",
       "ofc003",
       "ofc004",
       "ofc005",
       "ofc006",
       "ofc007",
       "ofc008",
       "ofc009",
       "ofc00a"
     ]
   }
 ]
}}}
